degree.name: Data Struture with Java
degree.detail: This course covers data structures using the Java Programming Language.

degree.name: Computer Architecture
degree.detail: Computer organization with emphasis on processors, memory, and input/output. Includes pipelining, ALUs, caches, virtual memory, parallelism, measuring performance, and basic operating systems concepts.

degree.name: Database Management
degree.detail: This course provides a theoretical yet modern presentation of database topics ranging from Data and Object Modeling, relational algebra and normalization to advanced topics such as how to develop Web-based database applications.

degree.name: Discrete Mathematics
degree.detail: the study of mathematical structures that are countable or otherwise distinct and separable.

degree.name: Software Engineering
degree.detail: Overview of techniques and tools to develop high quality software.

degree.name: Analysis of Algorithms
degree.detail: Discusses basic methods for designing and analyzing efficient algorithms emphasizing methods used in practice.

degree.name: Operating System
degree.detail: Overview of operating system characteristics, design objectives, and structures.

degree.name: Foundations of Analytics with R
degree.detail: The goal of this course is to provide students with the mathematical and practical background required in the field of data analytics.

degree.name: Data Mining
degree.detail: The goal of this course is to study basic concepts and techniques of data mining.

degree.name: Web Analytics and Mining
degree.detail: The Web Analytics and Mining course covers the areas of web analytics, text mining, web mining, and practical application domains.

degree.name: Data Analysis and Visualization with R
degree.detail: This course provides an overview of the statistical tools most commonly used to process, analyze, and visualize data.

degree.name: Computer Language Theory
degree.detail: Theory of finite automata and regular expressions and properties of regular sets.

degree.name: Web Application Development
degree.detail: This course focuses on building core competencies in web design and development.
